Sentencas: The thermal stress, which has a significant impact on the stable and prolonged operation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs), can be further aggravated by the presence of local hot spots.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Improving the distribution uniformity of physical quantities is of great significance to improving the internal temperature distribution of the SOFC.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study, to improve the uniformity of temperature distribution, the thermal and flow distribution of three kinds of flow fields are investigated including Z, U, and L flow fields.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that the temperature distribution is dominated by the flow rate distribution.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To optimize the physical quantity distribution of the designed flow channel, a novel, and easy-tomanufacture thermal management is proposed.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This method is to adopt the extended ridge for controlling the flow rate into each flow channel.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Moreover, a multi-population genetic algorithm is adopted to optimize the length of each extended ridge.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The optimized results show that the temperature deviation in the Z, U, and L flow fields are reduced by about 64.20 %, 26.06 %, and 23.45 % respectively.
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This novel thermal management method enables more uniform temperature distribution and it is expected to be used in large-scale manufacturing due to its simple but subtle design.(c) 2023
Titulo: A novel flow channel design to achieve high temperature homogenization in solid oxide fuel cell
